title: Hot smoked salmon on toast with avocado & chilli jam

ingredients.item: 3 tbsp essential Waitrose Low Fat Natural Yogurt
160g hot smoked salmon, skinned and broken into large flakes

instructions.step: Toast the sourdough. Spoon the avocado into a bowl and mash up the flesh with a fork. Stir through the yogurt and lemon juice. Season with salt. Spread onto the sourdough toast.
Scatter over the flaked salmon and salad onions, then top with the chilli jam, to serve.
